textAfterTable: Game Overview Need for Speed: Most Wanted (Criterion) is a reimagining of the original Most Wanted game. It was developed by Criterion Games and published by EA for the PC, PlayStation 3, PlayStation Vita, Xbox 360 and iOS platforms in October and November, 2012. A Wii U version was also later released in March, 2013.
